title: Bibi & Mimi font
content:
Friends

please help me id the font used for the logo of Bibi & Mimi dot com.  
 [http://www.bibiandmimi.com/images/logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907164716/http:/www.bibiandmimi.com/images/logo.jpg)

Thanks in advance

Miguel

author: hernando

comments.content:
Usually I relish in picking on Papyrus, but actually it has one prettiest ampersands around.

Mikey :-)
